channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Poison Ivy
channel.description:
Poison Ivy

Neutral Killer **Passive (Nature With Us)** - Immune to death, poison and bleeding **Day Ability (Poison Breath)** - Target a player it gives that player bleed/nightshade. (3 uses) **Day Ability (Charm)**- Target a player, it will give the feedback of that player's action. (3 uses) **Night Ability (The curse of Flowers)** - Target a player, that player get the curse. Curse player visited another curse player will lead them to die. (Infinite uses) **Night Ability (Seed Dispersal)** - Target a player to kill. If that player is cursed, whoever visits them, gets the curse. (Infinite uses) Goal : Kill all members of the main factions.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Poison Ivy
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
Your passives give you away, just make it bleed and death immune.

I like the idea behind cursing and it’s effect where people visiting someone with the curse dies, what I’d propose however, is an ability to make someone your “cursed” who curses whoever visits them and if a cursed player visits the “cursed” then they die.

It also needs a direct method of killing too, so maybe a 3-time usual kill.

There’s a few avenues you could take with this class
